body: { "text":"PO Number : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{poNumber}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"PO Date : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{poDate}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Store Name : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{storeName}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"PO Status : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{poStatus}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"PO Rate Type : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{rateType}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Supplier Name : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{supplierName}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Expected Delivery Date : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{deliveryDate}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Rate Contract/Tender/Quotation No. : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{rateContractNumber}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Rate Contract/Tender/Quotation Date : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{rateContractDate}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Delivery Terms : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] , "style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{deliveryTerms}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"colSpan":3, "style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Payment Terms : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] , "style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{paymentTerms}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"colSpan":3, "style": "tm-cols-table"}
{ "text":"Remarks : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] , "style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{remark}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"colSpan":3, "style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Created By Employee : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{createdBy}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Created By Employee Designation : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{designation}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Sr.No.", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Material Code", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table" }, { "text":"Material Name", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table" }, { "text":"Indent No.", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Total Indent Quantity", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"UOM Name", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Order Quantity", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Unit Rate", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Total Value (Value of Order Quantity * Unit Rate)", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"PO Purpose", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Work Details/Remarks", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}

{{#variable1}}[ "{ "text":"{{srNo}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{materialCode}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table-value" }, { "text":"{{materialName}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table-value" }, { "text":"{{indentNumber}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{indentQuantity}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{uomName}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{orderQuantity}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{unitRate}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{totalValue}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{poPurpose}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{workDetailsRemark}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}" ]{{/variable1}}

{ "text":"Sr. No.", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"},{ "text":"Date", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Updated By", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table" }, { "text":"Status", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Current Assignee", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Comments", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}

{{#variable2}}[ "{ "text":"{{srNo}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"},{ "text":"{{date}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{updatedBy}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table-value" }, { "text":"{{status}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{currentAssignee}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{comments}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}" ]{{/variable2}}
